segments.text: What should I do when I find a job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are a few considerations . Is this a part-time or full-time job ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Basically , you really don â€™ t need to do much of anything . On the Continued Claim Form , you will note that you now have a new job and also note what you are earning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If I get work for a few weeks , will I be terminated from EDD ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You will not mess up your job benefits by taking work . You can always come back and notify EDD that you are once again in need of assistance .
segments.speaker: S2
